title: Punnitse ja Saasta Malmi
description: A store that holds a large variety of nuts, dried fruit, muesli, seeds and chocolates to be bought by the weight. Most of the products sold by weight are vegan, all are vegetarian. 2nd floor by escalators. The store also has lots of teas and coffees, spices, snacks, sauces, chips, superfoods and more. The staff can order new items if requested though it might take a week or so. Has a good selection of gluten-free food available.
